sentences.en: An overcrowded workplace can be a major source of stress.
sentences.cn: 拥挤的工作空间可能是压力的主要来源.

sentences.en: In many places, classrooms are overcrowded and curricula are outdated.
sentences.cn: 许多地方的教室过于拥挤,课程已经过时.

sentences.en: Injured people continue to arrive at already overcrowded hospitals.
sentences.cn: 已经非常拥挤的医院继续接纳更多的伤者.

sentences.en: Many lived in overcrowded buildings in the poor sections of large cities.
sentences.cn: 许多人住在大城市贫困区过度拥挤的楼里.

sentences.en: Morocco's capital, until independence, was badly overcrowded.
sentences.cn: 摩洛哥的首都在独立前一直都拥挤不堪。

sentences.en: Overcrowded prisons are an impediment to the rehaBilitation of criminals.
sentences.cn: 过于拥挤的牢房对罪犯们精神重建造成阻碍.

sentences.en: Seeing that the bus was overcrowded, I had to cab it.
sentences.cn: 看见公共汽车过于拥挤, 我只好坐出租车去了.

sentences.en: Staff had to work in overcrowded conditions.
sentences.cn: 员工们只得在过度拥挤的环境中工作。
那是一列过分拥挤的火车.

sentences.en: The assembly hall was overcrowded long before the performance began.
sentences.cn: 演出开始前,大会堂里早已挤得水泄不通了.

sentences.en: The bus was already overcrowded but they were still packing people in.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车已经拥挤不堪了,可是他们还在让乘客挤进来.

sentences.en: The people were packed into an already overcrowded bus.
sentences.cn: 人们被挤入了一辆已很拥挤的公共汽车.

sentences.en: The place was overcrowded with tourists.
sentences.cn: 那个地方挤满了观光客.

sentences.en: They must remain in slums or live with relatives, often in overcrowded conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们只有留在贫民住房区,或者寄居在亲戚家而又往往拥挤不堪.

sentences.en: Too many poor people are living in overcrowded conditions .
sentences.cn: 有太多的贫民生活在十分拥挤的条件下。

trans.tran_en: filled with too many people or things

trans.tran_cn: 拥挤(overcrowd的过去式和过去分词)
